abstract: A technology industry foundation aims to reduce password overload among computer users through the creation of a system akin to an online identity card.
snippet: A technology industry foundation aims to reduce password overload among computer users through the creation of a system akin to an online identity card.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Microsoft, Google and PayPal, a unit of eBay, are among the founders of an industry organization that hopes to solve the problem of password overload among computer users.

headline.main: Technology Leaders Favor Online ID Card Over Passwords
headline.print_headline: Technology Leaders Favor Online ID Card Over Passwords

abstract: Yahoo ‘s shares surged Tuesday afternoon after TechCrunch reported that Microsoft is back in talks to buy the company. Yahoo’s stock was up more than 2 percent on the news.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo ‘s shares surged Tuesday afternoon after TechCrunch reported that Microsoft is back in talks to buy the company. Yahoo’s stock was up more than 2 percent on the news.

headline.main: False Alarm: Microsoft Is NOT in Talks with Yahoo Again
